div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1076 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1946 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 4 AR, I AE. In ancient pit in lower town Olbia: 4 st. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 2) 1 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 26-29) Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
